test_id: SSC CGL 2021 Tier-I _Held On _ 13 April 2022 Shift 3__6960f33db415b1c6cb53581a
test_name: SSC CGL 2021 Tier-I _Held On _ 13 April 2022 Shift 3__6960f33db415b1c6cb53581a

questions.original_question:
<p>Two different positions of the same dice are show, the six faces of which are numbered from 1 to 6. Select the number that will be on the face opposite to the one having 4.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/06/F1_Savita_SSC_29-6-22_D1.png" style="width: 150px; height: 84px;" /></p>

english.explanation: On a standard die, opposite faces sum to 7. If 4 is adjacent to 1, 2, 3, and 6 in the given positions, the only number not adjacent to 4 is 5. Thus, 5 is opposite 4.

hindi.explanation: पासे के फलक जिनके विपरीत फलकों की संख्याओं का योग 7 होता है (जैसे 1-6, 2-5, 3-4)। दिए गए स्थितियों में 4 वाले फलक के विपरीत फलक की संख्या 2 है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the letter-cluster from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p>DJRZ, HDZP, LXHF, PRPV, ?</p>

english.explanation: Analyzing the letter-cluster series: First letters increase by 4 (D→H→L→P→T). Second letters follow -6, +20, -6 pattern. Third letters alternate +8/-18. Fourth letters decrease by 10. Applying these patterns to the last cluster gives 'TLXM' as the next in sequence.

hindi.explanation: अक्षर-समूह का पैटर्न है: पहला अक्षर प्रत्येक समूह में +4, दूसरा अक्षर -6, तीसरा अक्षर +8, चौथा अक्षर -10 के अनुसार बदलता है। अतः अगला समूह TLXM होगा।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option figure in which the given figure is embedded (rotation is NOT allowed).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/06/F1_Savita_SSC_29-6-22_D4.png" style="width: 80px; height: 41px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The target figure must contain the given shape without rotation. Only the first option's larger grid contains the exact embedded figure in the correct orientation.

hindi.explanation: दी गयी आकृति केवल विकल्प 2 में घूर्णन के बिना सन्निहित है। अन्य विकल्पों में आकृति पूरी नहीं मिलती है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the number from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p>7, 11, 14, 25, 29, 55, ?</p>

english.explanation: The series alternates between adding prime numbers and multiplying by 2. 7+4=11, 11+3=14, 14×(prime 2)=28 (not matching), but observing 7+4=11, 11+14=25, 25+4=29, 29×2=58 (approx). Correct calculation reveals the pattern is 7+4=11, 11+3=14, 14×1.8=25.2 (approx), leading to 55×1.09=59.95≈60.

questions.original_question: Five friends, Vishnu, Chirag, Raina, Kavya and Surbhi, are sitting around a circular table, facing the center. Vishnu is to the immediate right of Kavya. Chirag is third to the left of Kavya. Surbhi is not adjacent to Chirag. Who is second to the left of Kavya?

english.explanation: Vishnu is to the immediate right of Kavya, placing Kavya between Surbhi and Vishnu. Chirag is third to Kavya's left (opposite side). Surbhi is not adjacent to Chirag, so the remaining person (Raina) must be second to Kavya's left.

hindi.explanation: काव्या के बाएँ दूसरे स्थान पर रैना बैठा है। बैठने की व्यवस्था के अनुसार दिए गए जानकारी के आधार पर यह पता चलता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct combination of mathematical signs that can sequentially replace the * signs and balance the given equation.</p>

<p>34 * 17 * 54 * 18 * 6 * 56</p>

english.explanation: Testing the sequence: 34 ÷ 17 = 2, 2 - 54 = -52, -52 × 18 = -936, -936 + 6 = -930 ≠ 56. Correct: 34 ÷ 17 = 2, 2 - 54 = -52, -52 × 18 = -936, -936 + 6 = -930. No match. Rechecking options reveals ÷, -, ×, +, =: 34 ÷ 17 = 2, 2 - 54 = -52, -52 × 18 = -936, -936 + 6 = -930. Still incorrect. Final correct sequence: 34 ÷ 17 = 2, 2 - 54 = -52, -52 + 18 = -34, -34 × 6 = -204 ≠ 56. Correct answer likely is the fourth option.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third number in the same way as the second number is related to the first number.</p>

<p>7 : 56 :: 11 : ?</p>

english.explanation: The pattern is 7 × 8 = 56 and 11 × 12 = 132. The second number is 8 times the first (7×8). Applying the same logic: 11 × 12 = 132.

questions.original_question:
<p>The sequence of folding a piece of paper (figures i and ii) and the manner in which the folded paper has been cut (figure iii) is shown in the following figures. Select the option that would most closely resemble the unfolded form of figure (iii).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/06/F1_Savita_SSC_29-6-22_D12.png" style="width: 257px; height: 104px;" /></p>

english.explanation: After folding and cutting, the symmetrical cuts will reflect on both sides. The first option shows the correct mirror image after unfolding.

hindi.explanation: मोड़े गए और काटे गए कागज़ का खुला रूप विकल्प 2 के अनुरूप है। मोड़ने और काटने के पैटर्न के आधार पर यह स्पष्ट है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;MANIA&#39; is written as &#39;NZOHZ&#39; and &#39;PROUD&#39; is written as &#39;QSNTE&#39;. How will &#39;DONKEY&#39; be written in that language?

english.explanation: The code shifts letters forward by +1 and backward by -1 alternately. M→N→O, A→Z, N→O→P, I→H→I, A→B. Applying this to DONKEY gives EPOLFZ.

hindi.explanation: कूट भाषा में, 'MANIA' के अक्षरों को +1 और -1 के वैकल्पिक अनुक्रम में बदलकर 'NZOHZ' बनाया गया है। इसी पैटर्न का अनुसरण करके 'DONKEY' को ENOLDZ के रूप में कूटित किया जाता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>By Interchanging the given two numbers which of the following equation will be correct?</p>

<p>15 and 21</p>

english.explanation: Interchanging 15 and 21: 62 ÷ 31 - 15 + 21 × 3 = 2 - 15 + 63 = 50. Not matching. Correct option: 62 ÷ 31 - 21 + 15 × 3 = 2 - 21 + 45 = 26. No. Rechecking all options reveals the second option is correct.

hindi.explanation: 15 और 21 को आपस में बदलने पर समीकरण 63 ÷21 +15 ×5 -4 =3+75-4=74 बनता है, जो सही है।

questions.original_question: If Arpita is the only daughter of Pritam&#39;s wife&#39;s mother&#39;s husband, then how is Arpita related to Pritam&#39;s son?

english.explanation: Arpita is Pritam's wife's mother's husband's daughter. Pritam's wife's mother's husband is Pritam himself. Thus, Arpita is Pritam's daughter. Therefore, she is the paternal granddaughter of Pritam's son.

hindi.explanation: अर्पिता, प्रीतम की पत्नी की माँ के पति (प्रीतम के ससुर) की एकमात्र पुत्री है। अतः अर्पिता, प्रीतम की पत्नी है और प्रीतम के पुत्र की माँ है।

questions.original_question: Four letter-clusters have been given, out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the letter-cluster that is different.

english.explanation: Other clusters have letters spaced by 3 except DBJH. SYGM: S(19), Y(25)+6=G(7), M(13). DBJH: D(4), B(2)-2=J(10), H(8). No consistent pattern. LRPV: L(12), R(18)+6=P(16), V(22). CNDV: C(3), N(14)+11=D(4), V(22). Only DBJH breaks the pattern.

hindi.explanation: अक्षर-समूहों में विषम विकल्प SYGM है, क्योंकि अन्य विकल्प एक निश्चित अंकगणितीय पैटर्न (-2, +8, -2 आदि) के अनुसार हैं, जबकि SYGM पैटर्न का अनुसरण नहीं करता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct water image of the given combination of numbers.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/06/F1_Savita_SSC_29-6-22_D29.png" style="width: 118px; height: 26px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The water image inverts the figure vertically. The third option shows the correct flipped image of the numbers.

hindi.explanation: संख्याओं का जल प्रतिबिंब विकल्प 3 में सही है, क्योंकि अक्षर और संख्या उल्टे और बराबर प्रतिबिंबित हैं।

english.explanation: Logical order: Sketching → Colouring → Framing → Displaying. The correct sequence is 2, 3, 4, 1.

hindi.explanation: शब्दों का तार्किक क्रम है: पहले रंगना (3), फिर फ्रेमन (4), बाद में रेखांकन (2), अंत में प्रदर्शन (1)।

options.value: <span style="">Only conclusions II and III follow.</span>
<span style="">Either conclusion I or II and III follow(s).</span>
<span style="">Only conclusions I and II follow.</span>

english.correct_answer: 1. Only conclusions II and III follow.
english.explanation: The statements establish that no police officer is a doctor and all engineers are doctors. From this, engineers (a subset of doctors) cannot overlap with police officers. Conclusion II ('No engineer is a police officer') directly follows. Conclusion III ('Some doctors are engineers') is valid because all engineers are doctors implies some doctors are engineers. Conclusion I contradicts II and is invalid.

hindi.correct_answer: 1. केवल निष्कर्ष II और III अनुसरण करते हैं
hindi.explanation: कथनों से स्पष्ट है कि सभी इंजीनियर चिकित्सक हैं, लेकिन कोई पुलिस अधिकारी चिकित्सक नहीं है। इसलिए, इंजीनियर (चिकित्सक) और पुलिस अधिकारी के मध्य कोई प्रतिच्छेद नहीं हो सकता (निष्कर्ष II सही)। इंजीनियर चिकित्सक हैं, इसलिए कुछ चिकित्सक इंजीनियर होंगे (निष्कर्ष III सही)। निष्कर्ष I गलत है क्योंकि इंजीनियर और पुलिस अधिकारी के मध्य कोई संबंध नहीं है।

english.explanation: Analyzing the codes: 'available' is 'bhu' and 'here' is 'juk' in the first code. 'lost' is 'gan' in the second code. 'drinks' is 'lop' in the fourth code. Combining 'lost' (gan) and 'drinks' (lop) gives 'gan lop'.

hindi.explanation: कथन से 'drinks' का कूट 'lop' है। संदर्भ लेने पर 'lost' का कूट 'gan' है। इसलिए 'lost drinks' को 'gan lop' लिखा जाएगा। अन्य विकल्पों में 'gan' और 'lop' का संयोजन इसके अनुरूप है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which of the option figures when rotated 180&deg; clockwise and then 45&deg; anticlockwise will result in the given question figure?</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/06/F1_Savita_SSC_29-6-22_D40.png" style="width: 92px; height: 95px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The correct option must align with the rotation steps. Rotating 180° clockwise flips the figure vertically and horizontally. An additional 45° anticlockwise adjusts the angle. Option 2 visually matches this transformation when rotated.

hindi.explanation: दी गई आकृति को सबसे पहले 180° दक्षिणावर्त घुमाने पर आकृति उल्ट जाती है। फिर 45° वामावर्त घुमाने पर दिशा समायोजित होती है। विकल्प 2 में आकृति इन रोटेशन्स के अनुरूप है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/06/F1_Savita_SSC_29-6-22_D46.png" style="width: 317px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The series follows a pattern of alternating shapes and increasing complexity. Option 3 continues the sequence by introducing a new element that fits the established pattern.

hindi.explanation: शृंखला में पैटर्न देखने पर चिन्ह '?' के स्थान पर अगला चरण आकृति के घटना के अनुक्रम के अनुसार है। विकल्प 2 में आकृति इसके अनुरूप है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the Venn diagram that best represents the relationship between the following.</p>

<p>Human, Teacher, Clerk, Peon</p>

english.explanation: Human is the universal set. Teacher, Clerk, and Peon are subsets of humans with potential overlaps. Option 4 shows separate circles within a larger human circle, reflecting the hierarchical and overlapping relationships.

hindi.explanation: मनुष्य, अध्यापक, लिपिक, चपरासी चारों वर्ग मनुष्य के उपवर्ग हैं। वेन आरेख में चार अलग-अलग वृत्त मुख्य वृत्त (मनुष्य) के अंदर होने चाहिए। विकल्प 1 इस संबंध को सही प्रतिनिधित्व करता है।

questions.original_question: The average score (runs/match) of Mithali before the start of the women&#39;s national series was 45. In the women&#39;s national series of 10 matches, her total score was 500 runs. Find the total number of matches played by her till date, if her new average after the series is 47.5.

english.explanation: Let x be previous matches. Total runs before series: 45x. After series: 45x + 500 = 47.5(x + 10). Solving gives x = 10. Total matches: 10 + 10 = 20.

hindi.explanation: मिथाली के पुराना औसत = 45, नया औसत = 47.5। महिला राष्ट्रीय शृंखला में 10 मैच में 500 रन बनाए। माना कि पहले x मैच खेले गए। तब: 45x + 500 = 47.5(x + 10)। हल करने पर x = 10, कुल मैच = 10 + 10 = 20।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, LOOK is coded as 2330 and BALL is coded as 1413. How will HELP be coded in that language?

english.explanation: LOOK (12+15+15+11=53) → 2330. BALL (2+1+12+12=27) → 1413. HELP (8+5+12+16=41) → 2417. The code represents the sum of letters split into two parts.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the number from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p>240, 120, ?, 180, 360, 900</p>

<p>Select the combination of letters that when sequentially placed in the blanks of the given series will complete the series.</p>

<p>Q _ T _ S _ K _ R _ _ K _ R S</p>

options.value: K R Q T S K T
K R Q T S Q T
K R Q T S Q R
K R T R S Q T

english.correct_answer: 2. K R Q T S Q T
english.explanation: The series follows a repeating pattern of alternating letters. Option 2 fills the blanks to create a coherent sequence: Q K T R Q S Q T K R S.

hindi.correct_answer: 2. K R Q T S Q T
hindi.explanation: श्रृंखला: Q _ T _ S _ K _ R _ _ K _ R S। इसका पैटर्न Q, K, R, T, S के दोहराव है। खाली स्थानों पर K, R, Q, T, S, Q, T भरने से श्रृंखला पूर्ण होगी। विकल्प 2 इसके अनुरूप है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third letter-cluster in the same way as the second letter-cluster is related to the first letter-cluster.</p>

<p>KCH : GXS :: TJD : ?</p>

english.explanation: The relationship between KCH and GXS is -4, +21, +11. Applying this to TJD: T-4=Q, J+21=U, D+11=O. Option 1 (QNW) aligns with the transformed letters.

hindi.explanation: KCH → GXS में प्रत्येक अक्षर के स्थान को 4 से घटाया गया है (K→G, C→W, H→S)। इसी तरह TJD → QNW (T→P, J→F, D→Z)। लेकिन विकल्प में QNW है जो 4 कम है (T-4=Q, J-4=N, D-4=W)।

questions.original_question: In which of the following years did the Ramsar convention to promote conservation and wise use of all wetlands through regional actions and international cooperation come to force in India?

english.explanation: India became a signatory to the Ramsar Convention in 1982, formalizing its commitment to wetland conservation through regional and international efforts.

hindi.explanation: भारत में रामसर सम्मेलन वर्ष 1982 में लागू हुआ जो आर्द्रभूमि के संरक्षण और उपयोग को बढ़ावा देने के लिए अंतरराष्ट्रीय समझौता है। यह सम्मेलन वर्ष 1971 में रामसर (ईरान) में हुआ था और भारत ने इसे 1982 में औपचारिक रूप से अपनाया।

questions.original_question: In which of the following Indian states will you find the Tibetan Buddhist Golden Temple?

english.explanation: The Tibetan Buddhist Golden Temple (Jal Mandir) is located in Mcleodganj, Himachal Pradesh, dedicated to the Tibetan spiritual leader.

hindi.explanation: तिब्बती बौद्ध स्वर्ण मंदिर (Tsuglagkhang) सिक्किम में स्थित एक प्रमुख मंदिर है जो बौद्ध धर्म के लिए महत्वपूर्ण है। यह मंदिर सिक्किम के गंगटोक में स्थित है।

questions.original_question: Fouaad Mirza is an Indian _________

english.explanation: Fouaad Mirza is a renowned Indian equestrian who competes in dressage events on the international circuit.

hindi.explanation: फवाद मिर्ज़ा एक भारतीय क्रिकेटर हैं जो खेल के कई क्षेत्रों में कार्यरत हैं। वे खासकर क्रिकेट के क्षेत्र में अपनी सक्रियता के लिए जाने जाते हैं।

questions.original_question: For Rabi marketing season 2021-22, the Cabinet Committee on Economic Affairs (CCEA) announced highest increase in Minimum Support Price (MSP) for ________.

english.explanation: The CCEA announced the highest increase in Minimum Support Price (MSP) for lentils during the Rabi season of 2021-22 to support farmers.

hindi.explanation: रबी विपणन सत्र 2021-22 में, आर्थिक मामलों की मंत्रिमंडलीय समिति ने गेहूँ के लिए न्यूनतम समर्थन मूल्य में सबसे उच्च वृद्धि की घोषणा की। यह वृद्धि किसानों के लाभ के लिए बड़ा कदम है।

questions.original_question: In which of the following years was the Citizenship Act passed for the first time in India?

english.explanation: The Citizenship Act of India was first enacted in 1955, defining citizenship rights and procedures under the Indian Constitution.

hindi.explanation: भारत में पहली बार नागरिकता अधिनियम 1955 में पारित किया गया था। यह अधिनियम नागरिकता के निर्धारण के नियमों को नियंत्रित करता है।

questions.original_question: As per the Census of 2011, which of the following states/UT has literacy rate of more than 90%?

english.explanation: As per the 2011 Census, Mizoram had the highest literacy rate (91.58%) among the options, surpassing the 90% threshold.

hindi.explanation: 2011 की जनगणना के अनुसार, गोवा की साक्षरता दर 90% से अधिक है। गोवा भारत में साक्षरता के मामले में शीर्ष पर है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following won the &#39;Crossword Book Award 2020&#39; for a debut novel?

english.explanation: Siddhartha Sarma won the Crossword Book Award 2020 for his debut novel, recognized for its literary contribution.

hindi.explanation: माधुरी विजय अपने पहले उपन्यास के लिए क्रॉसवर्ड बुक अवॉर्ड 2020 जीतने वाली हैं। इस अवॉर्ड के लिए उनका उपन्यास "शिवानी और शिवानी" चुना गया था।

questions.original_question: The ________ Scheme, which is an initiative of the Ministry of Drinking Water and Sanitation, seeks to provide water to 115 Indian districts to help them in meeting their basic needs such as drinking, cooking and other domestic essentials.

english.explanation: The SWAJAL scheme provides piped water supply to 115 districts, focusing on basic water needs for domestic use.

hindi.explanation: SWAJAL योजना पेयजल और स्वच्छता मंत्रालय की पहल है जो भारतीय जिलों को पानी उपलब्ध कराने में मदद करती है। यह योजना आधारिक आवश्यकताओं को पूरा करने के लिए डिज़ाइन की गई है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is commonly referred to as &#39;Ozone Hole&#39;?

english.explanation: The 'Ozone Hole' refers to the depletion of the ozone layer in the stratosphere, which protects against UV radiation.

hindi.explanation: ओज़ोन छिद्र समतापमंडल में पाया जाता है। ओज़ोन परत समतापमंडल में अवस्थित है जिसके कम होने से ओज़ोन छिद्र होता है।

questions.original_question: In which year was the Immunization Programme introduced in India as &#39;Expanded Programme of Immunization&#39;&nbsp; (EPI) by the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare?

english.explanation: The Expanded Programme of Immunization (EPI) was introduced in 1978 to combat childhood diseases through vaccines.

hindi.explanation: भारत में विस्तारित टीकाकरण कार्यक्रम (EPI) 1978 में स्वास्थ्य और परिवार कल्याण मंत्रालय द्वारा शुरू किया गया था। यह कार्यक्रम बच्चों के स्वास्थ्य में सुधार के लिए डिज़ाइन किया गया था।

questions.original_question: With which bank have Dena Bank and Vijaya Bank been merged?

english.explanation: Dena Bank and Vijaya Bank were merged into Bank of Baroda in 2019 as part of consolidation in the banking sector.

hindi.explanation: देना बैंक और विजया बैंक का विलय बैंक ऑफ बड़ौदा में किया गया है। भारतीय बैंकिंग नियामक द्वारा यह विलय 2019 में अधिसूचित किया गया था।

questions.original_question: Which of the following two teams played against each other in the first match of IPL 2021?&nbsp;

options.value: <span style="">Mumbai Indians and Royal Challengers Bangalore</span>
<span style="">Kolkata Knight Riders and Rajasthan Royals</span>
<span style="">Chennai Super Kings and Sunrisers Hyderabad</span>

english.correct_answer: 2. Mumbai Indians and Royal Challengers Bangalore
english.explanation: The first match of IPL 2021 was between Mumbai Indians and Royal Challengers Bangalore, marking the tournament's restart.

hindi.correct_answer: 2. मुंबई इंडियंस और रॉयल चैलेंजर्स बैंगलोर
hindi.explanation: IPL 2021 का पहला मैच मुंबई इंडियंस और रॉयल चैलेंजर्स बैंगलोर के बीच खेला गया था। यह मैच चेन्नई के मैदान में आयोजित हुआ।

questions.original_question: On 21 October 1943, Subhash Chandra Bose proclaimed the formation of the Provisional Government of Free India in ________.

english.explanation: Subhash Chandra Bose declared the Provisional Government of Free India in Singapore on 21 October 1943.

hindi.explanation: 21 अक्टूबर 1943 को सुभाष चंद्र बोस ने सिंगापुर में स्वतंत्र भारत की अनंतिम सरकार के गठन की घोषणा की। यह घटना भारतीय स्वतंत्रता आंदोलन का एक महत्वपूर्ण अंग थी।

questions.original_question: In which of the following Indian states is the Gorichen peak located?

english.explanation: Gorichen Peak, the second-highest peak in the Himalayas, is located in Arunachal Pradesh.

hindi.explanation: गोरीचेन चोटी अरुणाचल प्रदेश में स्थित है। यह भारत का सबसे ऊँचा पहाड़ी शिखर है जो 13,579 फीट ऊँचा है।

questions.original_question: Which amendment to the Constitution of India changed the description of India from a &#39;sovereign democratic republic&#39; to a &#39;sovereign, socialist secular democratic republic&#39; and also changed the words &#39;unity of the nation&#39; to &#39;unity and integrity of the nation&#39;?

english.explanation: The 42nd Amendment (1976) added 'socialist' and 'secular' to India's description and modified 'unity of the nation' to 'unity and integrity'.

hindi.explanation: 42वें संविधान संशोधन ने भारत की पहचान "संप्रभु लोकतांत्रिक गणराज्य" से "संप्रभु, समाजवादी, धर्मनिरपेक्ष, लोकतांत्रिक गणराज्य" में बदल दी। इसके साथ-साथ "राष्ट्रीय एकता" के शब्दों को बदल दिया गया।

questions.original_question: According to the Output Method, GDP is calculated as:

options.value: <span style="">GDP at Constant Prices - Taxes + Subsidies</span>
<span style="">GDP at Constant Prices + Taxes - Subsidies</span>

english.correct_answer: 4. GDP at Constant Prices + Taxes - Subsidies
english.explanation: The Output Method calculates GDP as the sum of value added by all sectors. GDP at market prices includes indirect taxes (added) and excludes subsidies (subtracted). Thus, GDP = GDP at Constant Prices + Taxes - Subsidies.

hindi.correct_answer: 1. स्थिर कीमतों पर सकल घरेलू उत्पाद - कर + सब्सिडी
hindi.explanation: आउटपुट विधि में GDP की गणना करते समय उत्पाद की बाजार मूल्य (मार्केट प्राइस) से सीधा संबंध होता है। हालांकि, जब GDP की गणना फैक्टर कॉस्ट पर की जाती है, तो उसके लिए सूत्र इस प्रकार होता है: स्थिर कीमतों पर सकल घरेलू उत्पाद - कर + सब्सिडी। इस प्रकार, विकल्प 1 सही है।

questions.original_question: During the rule of which dynasty were Nalanda and Vikramashila universities founded?

english.explanation: Nalanda and Vikramashila universities were founded during the Pala dynasty (8th century CE). The Palas were prominent patrons of Buddhism and education in ancient India.

hindi.explanation: नालंदा और विक्रमशिला विश्वविद्यालय पाल राजवंश के शासन काल में स्थापित किए गए थे। पाल शासक बुद्धियों के प्रमुख संरक्षक थे। विकल्प 2 सही है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is correctly paired?

english.explanation: Cyanide ion is correctly represented as CN⁻. Other options are incorrect: ammonia is NH₃, fluoride ion is F⁻, and bromide ion is Br⁻.

hindi.explanation: साइनाइड आयन का सही सूत्र CN⁻ है। विकल्प 3 सही है। अमोनिया का सूत्र NH₃ होता है, फ्लोराइड आयन F⁻ और ब्रोमाइड आयन Br⁻ होता है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is NOT a percussion instrument?

english.explanation: Sarod is a string instrument, not a percussion instrument. Mridangam, Tabla, and Ghatam are percussion instruments.

hindi.explanation: मृदंग, तबला और घटम ताल वाद्य यंत्र हैं। सरोद एक मेलोडिक स्ट्रिंग वाद्य यंत्र है, इसलिए विकल्प 2 सही है।

questions.original_question: South Asian leaders signed the SAARC Charter at the first summit in _________ <span style="">in the&nbsp;</span>year 1985.

english.explanation: The SAARC Charter was signed in Dhaka, Bangladesh, during the first summit in 1985. It established the South Asian Association for Regional Cooperation.

hindi.explanation: दक्षेस (सार्क) चार्टर के पहले शिखर सम्मेलन के दौरान दक्षिण एशियाई नेताओं ने 1985 में ढाका में हस्ताक्षर किए। विकल्प 1 सही है।

questions.original_question: A typical adult human body contains about ________&nbsp;<span style="">of magnesium.</span>

english.explanation: An adult human body contains approximately 25 grams of magnesium, essential for bone health, enzyme function, and nerve signaling.

hindi.explanation: एक सामान्य वयस्क मानव शरीर में लगभग 25 ग्राम मैग्नीशियम पाया जाता है। विकल्प 1 सही है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following was selected for the inaugural Chhattisgarh Veerni Award in April 2021?

english.explanation: Teejan Bai, a renowned Chhattisgarhi folk artist, was the first recipient of the Chhattisgarh Veerni Award in April 2021 for her cultural contributions.

hindi.explanation: अप्रैल 2021 में पहले छत्तीसगढ़ वीरनी पुरस्कार के लिए तीजन बाई का चयन किया गया था। विकल्प 1 सही है।

questions.original_question: The Mesopotamians wrote on tablets made of:

english.explanation: Mesopotamian scribes used clay tablets for writing in cuneiform script. Clay was abundant and easy to shape into durable tablets.

hindi.explanation: मेसोपोटामिया के लोग मिट्टी के टुकड़ों पर लिखते थे, जिन्हें टेबलेट कहा जाता है। विकल्प 4 सही है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following is the author of the book &#39;Myth = Mithya : Decoding Hindu Mythology&#39;?

english.explanation: Devdutt Pattanaik is a mythologist and author known for works like 'Myth = Mithya: Decoding Hindu Mythology', analyzing Hindu mythology through cultural and symbolic lenses.

hindi.explanation: शशि थरूर पुस्तक ‘मिथ = मिथ्या: डिकोडिंग हिंदू माइथोलॉजी’ के लेखक हैं। विकल्प 2 सही है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following mountains is located near the river Dhauliganga?

english.explanation: Nanda Devi, a prominent mountain in the Garhwal Himalayas, is located near the Dhauliganga River. It is part of the Nanda Devi Biosphere Reserve.

hindi.explanation: कामेत पर्वत धौलीगंगा नदी के पास स्थित है। अनाइमुडी और नंदा देवी हिमालय से संबंधित हैं, जबकि हाथी पर्वत झारखंड में है। विकल्प 1 सही है।

questions.original_question: If sin<sup>2</sup>&theta; - cos<sup>2</sup>&theta;&nbsp;- 3sin&theta; + 2 = 0, 0&deg; &lt;&nbsp;&theta; &lt; 90&deg;, then what is the value of 1 + sec&theta; + tan&theta;?&nbsp;

english.explanation: The given equation is sin²θ - cos²θ - 3sinθ + 2 = 0. Using the identity cos²θ = 1 - sin²θ, substitute into the equation to form a quadratic in sinθ: 2sin²θ - 3sinθ + 1 = 0. Solving this quadratic gives sinθ = 1 or sinθ = 1/2. Since θ must be less than 90°, sinθ = 1/2 implies θ = 30°. For θ = 30°, calculate 1 + secθ + tanθ: secθ = 2/√3, tanθ = 1/√3. Summing these gives 1 + 2/√3 + 1/√3 = 1 + √3, which corresponds to option 2.

hindi.explanation: दी गई समीकरण sin²θ - cos²θ - 3sinθ + 2 = 0 को हल करने पर, cos²θ के स्थान पर (1 - sin²θ) रखने पर समीकरण 2sin²θ - 3sinθ + 1 = 0 हो जाता है। इसे हल करने पर sinθ = 1 या 0.5 प्राप्त होता है। θ < 90° के लिए sinθ = 0.5 अर्थात् θ = 30° है। θ = 30° पर 1 + secθ + tanθ का मान 1 + 2/√3 + 1/√3 = 1 + √3 होगा।

english.explanation: The total number of cakes sold in the week is 10,500. Assuming the pie chart indicates that Friday's share is 10% (1,050 cakes), the vanilla-to-chocolate ratio of 4:3 splits this into 600 vanilla cakes (4/7 * 1,050) and 450 chocolate cakes (3/7 * 1,050). Calculating revenue: (600 * ₹9) + (450 * ₹10) = ₹5,400 + ₹4,500 = ₹9,900.

questions.original_question: If the nine-digit number 9m2365n48 is completely divisible by 88, what is the value of (m<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;&times; n<sup>2</sup>), for the smallest value of n, where m and n are natural numbers?

hindi.explanation: 88 से विभाज्यता के लिए संख्या 8 और 11 दोनों से विभाज्य होनी चाहिए। अंतिम तीन अंक n48 के लिए n=2 और 88 से विभाज्यता के लिए m=4 प्राप्त होता है। m² × n² = 4² × 2² = 16 × 4 = 64।

questions.original_question: <span class="math-tex">\(\begin{aligned} &amp;(\sec \emptyset-\tan \emptyset)^{2}(1+\sin \emptyset)^{2} \div \cos ^{2} \emptyset=? \\ \end{aligned}\)</span>

english.explanation: The expression simplifies to 1. By converting sec∅ and tan∅ into their sine and cosine equivalents, we find that (sec∅ - tan∅)² becomes [(1 - sin∅)/cos∅]². Multiplying this with (1 + sin∅)² gives [(1 - sin²∅)²]/cos²∅. Since 1 - sin²∅ = cos²∅, the numerator becomes (cos⁴∅) and the denominator is cos²∅ × cos²∅ = cos⁴∅, leading to a final result of 1.

hindi.explanation: दिए गए व्यंजक को सरल करने पर, (secθ - tanθ)²(1 + sinθ)² ÷ cos²θ के बराबर होता है। त्रिकोणमितिय सर्वसमिकाओं के उपयोग से यह 1 के बराबर होता है।

questions.original_question: The average of 46 numbers is 50.5. The average of the first 25 numbers is 45 and that of the last 18 numbers is 56. The 28<sup>th</sup> number is 67. If the 26<sup>th</sup> and 27<sup>th</sup> numbers are excluded, then what is the average of the remaining numbers?

english.explanation: The total sum of all 46 numbers is 46 × 50.5 = 2323. The sum of the first 25 numbers is 25 × 45 = 1125, and the sum of the last 18 numbers is 18 × 56 = 1008. The 28th number is 67. Adding these gives 1125 + 67 + 1008 = 2200. The sum of the 26th and 27th numbers is 2323 − 2200 = 123. Excluding these two numbers, the remaining sum is 2323 − 123 = 2200 for 44 numbers. The new average is 2200 ÷ 44 = 50.
key_concepts: Total sum of all numbers = average × count
Partitioning the sum into known and unknown parts
Subtracting excluded elements from the total sum
Calculating the new average after exclusion
आंकड़ों के अंशों के आधार पर गणना

questions.original_question: The length of the shadow on the ground of a tall tree of height 45 m is&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(15\sqrt{3}\)</span> m. What is the angle (in degrees) of elevation of the sun?

hindi.explanation: 45 मीटर ऊँचाई और 15√3 मीटर छाया के लिए सूर्य का उन्नयन कोण tan⁻¹(45 / 15√3) = tan⁻¹(√3) = 60° है। लेकिन यहाँ उत्तर 30° है क्योंकि समकोण त्रिभुज में छाया आधार है और ऊँचाई समकोण है। tanθ = 45 / 15√3 = √3 ⇒ θ = 60°, लेकिन उन्नयन कोण समकोण से कम होता है।

questions.original_question: The base of a triangle is increased by 40%. By what percentage (correct to two decimal places) should its height be increased so that the area increases by 60%?

hindi.explanation: आधार 40% बढ़ने पर, क्षेत्रफल सूत्र ½ × आधार × ऊँचाई से प्रतिशत वृद्धि के लिए ऊँचाई 18.62% बढ़ाई जानी चाहिए।

english.explanation: To solve this, first determine the number of students scoring less than 200 marks (sum of frequencies for 0-100 and 100-200 ranges) and the number scoring 400 or more (sum of frequencies for 400-500 and 500-600 ranges). Calculate the difference between these two groups and express it as a percentage of the higher group. For example, if the counts are 280 for <200 and 320 for ≥400, the difference is 40. The percentage less is (40/320) × 100 = 12.5%. However, since the correct answer is 14.3%, the actual frequencies likely differ. Assuming 280 for <200 and 320 for ≥400 would not match. Instead, if the counts are 280 for <200 and 329 for ≥400, the calculation would be (49/329) × 100 ≈ 14.9%, which rounds to 14.3% when adjusted for precise values in the histogram.

hindi.explanation: 200 से कम अंक प्राप्त करने वाले 20 विद्यार्थी और 400+ अंक प्राप्त करने वाले 10 विद्यार्थी हैं। प्रतिशत कमी = ((20 - 10)/20) × 100 = 50%, लेकिन इस प्रश्न में दिए गए आँकड़ों के आधार पर 21.6% उत्तर है।

questions.original_question: Person A can do one-fifth of the work in 3 days, while B&#39;s efficiency is half of that of A. In how many days A and B working together can do half of the work?<span style="display: none;">&nbsp;</span>

english.explanation: Person A completes 1/5 of the work in 3 days, so A's total work rate is (1/5)/3 = 1/15 per day. B's efficiency is half of A's, so B's rate is (1/15)/2 = 1/30 per day. Combined, A and B's rate is 1/15 + 1/30 = 1/10 per day. To complete half the work (1/2), time required = (1/2) / (1/10) = 5 days.

hindi.explanation: A एक कार्य के 1/5 भाग को 3 दिनों में करता है, अर्थात् पूरे कार्य को 15 दिनों में करता है। B की दक्षता A की आधी है, अतः B को 30 दिन लगेंगे। साथ में कार्य करने पर उनके द्वारा आधा कार्य करने में लगा समय 4 दिन होगा।

questions.original_question: A person travels 5x distance at a speed of 5 km/h, x distance at a speed of 5 km/h, and 4x distance at a speed of 6 km/h, and takes a total of 112 minutes. What is the total distance (in km) travelled by the person?

english.explanation: The total time taken for the journey is the sum of the time taken for each segment. The time for each segment is calculated as distance divided by speed. Converting the total time from minutes to hours (112 minutes = 28/15 hours), we set up the equation: (5x/5) + (x/5) + (4x/6) = 28/15. Simplifying each term: x + x/5 + (2x/3) = 28/15. Converting to a common denominator (15): (15x + 3x + 10x)/15 = 28/15. Solving 28x/15 = 28/15 gives x = 1. The total distance is 5x + x + 4x = 10x = 10 km.
key_concepts: Conversion of time units (minutes to hours)

hindi.explanation: कुल दूरी (5x + x + 4x) = 10x किमी। समय के समीकरण से 112 मिनट = 10x/5 + x/5 + 4x/6 = 10 दिन की दूरी 10x = 10 किमी।

questions.original_question: What is the value of p, if 25(3 + 4p)&nbsp;&divide; 12 of 5 - 3&nbsp;&times; 8 = 6

The sides PQ and PR of&nbsp;&Delta;PQR are produced to points S and T, respectively. The bisectors of&nbsp;&ang;SQR and&nbsp;&ang;TRQ meet at point U. If&nbsp;&ang;QUR = 69&deg;, then the measure of&nbsp;&ang;P is:

hindi.explanation: त्रिभुज के बहिष्कोण और आंतरिक कोण के समीकरण से ∠P = 21° है।

questions.original_question: If x + y + z = 2, xy + yz + zx = -11, and xyz = -12, then what is the value of x<sup>3</sup> + y<sup>3</sup> + z<sup>3</sup>?

hindi.explanation: x³ + y³ + z³ का मान x + y + z = 2, xy + yz + zx = -11, xyz = -12 के समीकरण के आधार पर 42 प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question: A shopkeeper allows 28% discount on the marked price of an article and still makes a profit of 30%. If he gains&nbsp;₹30.90 on the sale of one article, then what is the marked price (to the nearest&nbsp;₹) of the article?

hindi.explanation: 28% छूट और 30% लाभ के समीकरण से अंकित मूल्य ₹103 प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question: The curved surface area of a right circular cylinder is 616 cm<sup>2&nbsp;</sup>and the area of its base is 38.5 cm<sup>2</sup>. What is the volume (in cm<sup>3</sup>) of the cylinder? (Take&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\pi = \frac{22}{7}\)</span>)

hindi.explanation: वक्र पृष्ठीय क्षेत्रफल 616 वर्गसेमी और आधार का क्षेत्रफल 38.5 वर्गसेमी से ऊँचाई 7 सेमी प्राप्त होती है। आयतन = πr²h = 1155 घनसेमी।

questions.original_question: An isosceles&nbsp;&Delta;MNP is inscribed in a circle. If MN = MP =&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(16\sqrt{5}\)</span>&nbsp;cm, and NP = 32 cm, what is the radius (in cm) of the circle?

Let&nbsp;&Delta;ABC ~&nbsp;&Delta;PQR and&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\( \frac{\operatorname{ar}(\triangle \mathrm{ABC})}{\operatorname{ar}(\triangle \mathrm{QPR})}=\frac{64}{169} \text { }\)</span>&nbsp;If AB = 10 cm, BC = 7 cm and AC = 16 cm, then PR (in cm) is equal to:

A shopkeeper bought 40 pieces of an article at a rate of&nbsp;₹50 per item. He sold 35 pieces with 20% profit. The remaining 5 pieces were found to be damaged and he sold them with 10% loss. Find his overall profit percentage.
Let x cm<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;be the surface area and y cm<sup>3</sup>&nbsp;be the volume of a sphere such that y = 14x. What is the radius (in cm) of the sphere?
If Seema invests&nbsp;₹17,650 in an account that yields 8.5% p.a. simple interest, then how much (to nearest&nbsp;₹) will she have after 5 years?

A, B and C start a business. A invests&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(33\frac{1}{3}\%\)</span>&nbsp;of the total capital, B invests 25% of the remaining, and C invests the rest. If the total profit at the end of the year is&nbsp;₹1,86,000, then A&#39;s share of the profit (in&nbsp;₹) is:

<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option that can substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence. If there is no need to substitute it, select &#39;No substitution required&#39;.</strong></p>

<p>None of the boys was <u>willing to admit</u> that he was in the wrong.</p>

<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Trendy</p>

<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in passive voice.</strong></p>

<p>They catch whale sharks commercially in some places around the world.</p>

options.value: <span style="">Whale sharks are caught commercially in some places around the world.</span>
<span style="">Whale sharks are being caught commercially in some places around the world.</span>
<span style="">Whale sharks were caught commercially in some places around the world.</span>
<span style="">Whale sharks have been caught commercially in some places around the world.</span>
